title: So... Why is 1/5 of the Champion Pool Useless Now?
body: ADC's are pretty much useless now, I'm getting rekt by a fucking mage in bot lane, this wasn't this hard a year ago, nor am I that bad. And I don't see people playing ADCs much anymore anyway. How is this healthy for the game, 1/5 of the champion pool being abandoned?

replies.body: ADCs have been the highest winrate bot champs for about 9 years now, even after crit was nerfed, they stayed on top.
Only 1/5? What about the  "non- Scuttle crab meta" Junglers?
Why does no-one play adc anymore, botlane mages suck.
